text:
is a Japanese professional football club in the Urawa ward of Saitama.
In 2007, the Urawa Reds were the first Japanese team to reach the finals of the Asian Champions League.
Its famous in Japan developing young good players.
History.
The club was founded in 1950.
Notable achievements.
In 2009, Edmilson (Edmilson Dos Santos Silva) made three goals in one game (hat-trick) against Jubilo Iwata.
